person.persName: James T. Sizemore (Hopkins Co. KY, pvt 4th ky mtd inf (csa))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Sizemore and Mary Sizemore. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 4th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as private from August 21, 1861. Reported as deserted at Booneville, Mississippi, on May 29, 1862.
